head.title: Overton Public Schools - UPDATE: School Closure 3/17 - 5/31

meta.content: Overton Public Schools - UPDATE: School Closure 3/17 - 5/31

Overton Public School will be closed for the remainder of the school year per the directive by Governor Ricketts and the recommendations by our local Health Departments.
We will continue in our Extended Learning Environment for the remainder of the 2019-2020 school year. Students will need to check Email and Schoology daily.

div.p: Overton Public School will be closed for the remainder of the school year per the directive by Governor Ricketts and the recommendations by our local Health Departments.
We will continue in our Extended Learning Environment for the remainder of the 2019-2020 school year. Students will need to check Email and Schoology daily.

div.em: Current conditions as of 22 Apr 08:55 am CDT

td.span: Mostly sunny, with a high near 77. West wind 5 to 15 mph becoming north in the afternoon. Winds could gust as high as 25 mph.
Mostly clear, with a low around 42. North wind 5 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph.

A 30 percent chance of showers and thunderstorms after 1pm. Mostly sunny, with a high near 74. West northwest wind 5 to 10 mph. New rainfall amounts of less than a tenth of an inch, except higher amounts possible in thunderstorms.
